headline: Mohawk Industries (MHK) Q2 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Mohawk Industries (MHK) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Mohawk Industries’s (NYSE:MHK) Q2 Sales Top Estimates
summary: Flooring manufacturer Mohawk Industries (NYSE:MHK) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q2 CY2025, but sales were flat year on year at $2.80 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.77 per share was 6.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Mohawk Industries (MHK) Beats Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Mohawk Industries (MHK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.73% and +0.37%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Mohawk Industries Reports Q2 2025 Results
summary: CALHOUN, Ga., July 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mohawk Industries, Inc. (NYSE: MHK) today announced second quarter 2025 net earnings of $147 million and earnings per share (“EPS”) of $2.34; adjusted net earnings were $173 million, and adjusted EPS was $2.77. Net sales for the second quarter of 2025 were $2.8 billion, essentially flat as reported and a decrease of 0.8% adjusted for constant days and exchange rates versus the prior year.
